  • Method Details

    • initialize

      void initialize(String startingPlayer)
      Initializes the game by setting up the map, flags, and bots.
      Parameters:
      startingPlayer - The player who starts the game.

    • start

      void start(String startingPlayer)
      Starts the game loop.
      Parameters:
      startingPlayer - The player who starts the game.

    • moveVisualizer

      void moveVisualizer(Bot currentBot)
      Visualizes the bot's move on the map and updates the game status. Highlights the edge between the previous and current location of the bot.
      Parameters:
      currentBot - The bot whose move is to be visualized.

    • addBot

      void addBot(Bot bot)
      Adds a new bot to the game.
      Parameters:
      bot - The bot to be added to the game.

    • getMap

      Gets the map associated with the game.
      Returns:
      The map object.
